name: Event Staffing (25 Guests)
description: Please select the required staff. This booking is for staff only. For additional services please see our add-ons below.

description: Please select the required staff. This booking is for staff only. For additional services please see our add-ons below.

description: This booking is for staff only. For additional services please see our other packages.

name: Custom Bar Package (50 Guests)
description: Have it your way! Please select the staff, materials, and additional time (if applicable) you would like for your event. This size will need at least 1 bartender. If you are supplying any materials then please select the items you would like to exclude.

addOns.name: Liquor 50 Guests - This is an estimate. Price may vary.

name: Custom Bar Package (100 Guests)
description: Have it your way! Please select the staff, materials, and additional time (if applicable) you would like for your event. This size will need at least 2 bartenders OR 1 Bartender and 1 Bar-back. If you are supplying any materials then please select the items you would like to exclude.

addOns.name: Liquor 100 Guests - This is an estimate. Price may vary.

name: Custom Bar Package (200 Guests)
description: Have it your way! Please select the staff, materials, and additional time (if applicable) you would like for your event. This size will need at least 3 bartenders AND 1 Bar-back. If you are supplying any materials then please select the items you would like to exclude.

addOns.name: Liquor 200 Guests - This is an estimate. Price may vary.

name: Basic Bar Package (25 Guests)
description: This package is for parties up to 25 guests and includes: +30 min for prep, 1 Bartender, liquor, and chasers for basic cocktails such as cognac and coke, vodka cran, screwdriver, etc. Chasers: Juices, Sodas, Water. Liquors: Vodka, Tequila, Rum, Gin, Whiskey, Cognac.

name: Basic Bar Package (50 Guests)
description: This package is for parties up to 50 guests and includes: +30 min for prep, 1 Bartender, liquor, and chasers for basic cocktails such as cognac and coke, vodka cran, screwdriver, etc. Chasers: Juices, Sodas, Water. Liquors: Vodka, Tequila, Rum, Whiskey.

name: Basic Bar Package (100 Guests)
description: This package is for parties up to 100 guests and includes: 2 Bar staff, liquor, and chasers for basic cocktails such as cognac and coke, vodka cran, screwdriver, etc. Chasers: Juices, Sodas, Water. Liquors: Vodka, Tequila, Cognac. Bar Essentials included.

name: Basic Bar Package (200 Guests)
description: This package is for parties up to 200 guests and includes: 3 Bartenders, 1 Bar-back, liquor, and chasers for basic cocktails such as Henny and coke, vodka cran, screwdriver, etc. Chasers: Juices, Sodas, Water. Bar Essentials: Cups, Napkins, Straws.

name: The Ready Experience (25 Guests)
description: This package is for up to 25 guests. It includes 1 bartender, +30min prep, liquor, chasers, mobile bar drop-off/pick-up, and our premium menu. This package makes 17+ classic cocktails. Chasers: Juices, Sodas, Water. Liquors: Vodka, Tequila, Rum, Whiskey.

name: The Ready Experience (50 Guests)
description: This package is for up to 50 guests. It includes 1 bartender, +30min prep, liquor, chasers, mobile bar drop-off/pick-up, and our premium menu. This package makes 17+ classic cocktails. Chasers: Juices, Sodas, Water. Liquors: Vodka, Tequila, Rum, Whiskey.

name: The Ready Experience (100 Guests)
description: This package is for up to 100 guests. It includes 2 bartenders, +30min prep, liquor, chasers, mobile bar drop-off/pick-up, and our premium menu. This package makes 17+ classic cocktails. Chasers: Juices, Sodas, Water. Liquors: Vodka, Tequila, Rum, Whiskey.

name: The Ready Experience (200 Guests)
description: This package is for up to 200 guests. It includes 3 bartenders & 1 bar-back, +30min prep, liquor, chasers, 2 mobile bars drop-off/pick-up, and our premium menu. This package makes 17+ classic cocktails. Chasers: Juices, Sodas, Water. Liquors: Vodka, Tequila, Rum, Whiskey.

name: Mocktail Package (50 Guests)
description: This package is for parties up to 50 guests and includes: 1 Bartender, mixers for various mocktails, and a menu for a list of the drinks available. Mixers: Lemonade, All Berries, Coke, Sprite, Ginger Ale, Coconut, Pineapple, and more.

name: Mocktail Package (100 Guests)
description: This package is for parties up to 100 guests and includes: 1 Bartender, 1 Bar-Back, and mixes for mocktails including a menu. Mixers: Lemonade, All Berries, Coke, Sprite, Ginger Ale, Coconut, Pineapple, Cranberry. Bar Essentials: Cups, Napkins, Straws.

name: Bartender's Class (2hrs)
description: Already certified but need more experience? Book this course to learn the basics with hands-on experience with our certified bar crew!

name: Crafts & Cocktails for 2
description: Visit Ready Bar to learn how to create your favorite cocktails while you unleash your creativity! This service includes a fun craft portion that will keep you entertained while you sip on your personally made cocktails from scratch. We provide all the materials needed for the activity.

name: Crafts & Cocktails for 3
description: Visit Ready Bar to learn how to create your favorite cocktails while you unleash your creativity! This service includes a fun craft portion that will keep you entertained while you sip on your personally made cocktails from scratch. We provide all the materials needed for the activity.
